review: Why we waited so long to get this is a mystery to us. The remote is simple to control and the fact that we can sign into Netflix and Hulu with it as well, makes this a must have item.  There are many more bells and whistles, but we just wanted it so we could watch Prime on our TV easily. It works better than you could imagine.
author: Customer

review: Had Google Chromecast and switched out for the Amazon FireStick and it's 50x times better. Can get all the shows and apps I want and need. I am 100% percent satisfied. Oh! and, as a result ... ditched my Cable company with their ridiculously overpriced packages. Saving hundreds of dollars and viewing 100x better programs.
